title: Advanced Project-Based Learning for Digital Education Technology and Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in essential digital tools and higher-education-level social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: Corporate social responsibility skill development through digital platforms: Learners use personal devices for collaborative projects addressing real-world business scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can formulate project design and implementation plans for social studies using various digital platforms
Learners can communicate and collaborate effectively in small-scale team projects using digital collaboration tools
Learners can propose practical applications based on critical analysis of the ethical and societal impacts of digital education technologies

resources: Accounts for various digital learning platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
